mapper.insert: insert into worker_info (worker_id, role, username, password, name, gender, phone,, email, address, create_time, update_time ) values (#{workerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(),now() )
